Query.Name: [Requests] by Month
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Request' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All WorkItems last GoBack Days
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.ChangedDate] >= @Today - @goBackDays

Query.Name: Count All WorkItems last GoBack Days
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.ChangedDate] >= @Today - @goBackDays

Query.Name: All TeamProject WorkItems last GoBack Days
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.ChangedDate] >= @Today - @goBackDays

Query.Name: Excessive Links
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.RelatedLinkCount] > 900

Query.Name: Excessive Links (Not Closed)
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.RelatedLinkCount] > 900 and [System.State] <> 'Closed'

Query.Name: All User Needs WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Needs' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All Feature WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Feature' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All Release WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Release' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All Request WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Request' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All Issue WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Issue' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: All Production Issue WI
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Production Issue' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: TP Releases
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Release' and [System.CreatedDate] >= '@startDate' and [System.CreatedDate] < '@endDate'

Query.Name: User Stories
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story'

Query.Name: User Stories No Points 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints] < 0 and [System.AreaPath] under '@project' and [System.IterationPath] under '@project' ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: User Stories No Points 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' AND [System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints] = '' ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: User Stories No Test Cases 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( Source.[System.TeamProject] = '@project' and Source.[System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' and Source.[System.State] in ('Closed', 'Resolved') and Source.[System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Migrated Items' ) and ([System.Links.LinkType] = 'Microsoft.VSTS.Common.TestedBy-Forward') and (Target.[System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case') ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: User Stories No Test Cases 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( Source.[System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND Source.[System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' AND Source.[System.State] in ('Active', 'Resolved') AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' ) and ([System.Links.LinkType] = 'Microsoft.VSTS.Common.TestedBy-Forward') and ( Target.[System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' AND [Target].[System.State] <> 'Closed' ) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode (DoesNotContain)

Query.Name: Tasks without Estimates 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ( [System.State] <> 'Removed' or [System.State] <> 'Closed' ) and [System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Trash Can' and [System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Migrated Items' and ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.OriginalEstimate] = '' ) ) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode(DoesNotContain)

Query.Name: Tasks without Estimates 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] NOT UNDER 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' AND ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.OriginalEstimate] = '' OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.RemainingWork] = '' OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.CompletedWork] = '' ) AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: Oversized Tasks 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ( [System.State] <> 'Removed' or [System.State] <> 'Closed' ) and [System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Trash Can' and [System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Migrated Items' and ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.OriginalEstimate] > 16 or [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.RemainingWork] > 16 ) ) and (Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('User Story', 'Test Case')) ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: Oversized Tasks 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] NOT UNDER 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') AND ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.OriginalEstimate] > 16 OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.RemainingWork] > 16 ) ORDER BY [System.Id]

Query.Name: Orphaned Bugs 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' and Source.[System.State] <> 'Removed' and Source.[System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Trash Can' and Source.[System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Migrated Items' and Source.[System.WorkItemType] = '' ) and (Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('User Story', 'Test Case')) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode(DoesNotContain)

Query.Name: Orphaned Bugs 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND [Source].[System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] NOT UNDER 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [Source].[System.State] <> 'Closed' ) And ([System.Links.LinkType] <> '') And ([Target].[System.WorkItemType] IN ('User Story', 'Test Case')) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode(DoesNotContain)

Query.Name: Orphaned Tasks 0608
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and Source.[System.State] <> 'Removed' and Source.[System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Trash Can' and Source.[System.IterationPath] <> '@project\Migrated Items' and Source.[System.WorkItemType] = '' ) and ([System.Links.LinkType] <> '') and (Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('User Story')) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode(DoesNotContain)

Query.Name: Orphaned Tasks 0720
Query.Query: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.Tags], [System.AreaPath], [System.IterationPath], [System.RelatedLinkCount], [System.ExternalLinkCount], [System.HyperLinkCount] FROM WorkItemLinks WHERE ( [System.TeamProject] = '@project' AND [Source].[System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] <> 'Agile Training\Trash Can' AND [Source].[System.AreaPath] NOT UNDER 'Agile Training\Help Desk' AND [Source].[System.State] IN ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') ) and ([System.Links.LinkType] <> '') and (Target.[System.WorkItemType] = ('User Story')) ORDER BY [System.Id] mode(DoesNotContain)
